name: Bumper Cars Idle
description:
Have you ever had the funniest Amusement Park in the world?

Please welcome the New Manager...

- Unlock NEW BUMPER CARS
- Attract NEW Clients
- Hire the BEST DJ in the World and make the park SUPER EXCITED
- Clients can Buy and Enjoy SPECIAL Yummy HotDogs !!!
- Unlock NEW Activities Like the Virtual Reality !
- Upgrade Your Park to MAKE MILLIONS OF DOLLARS !!!!

Are You Ready?!
